description:
Despite what any man feels deep down inside, the notion that trans women are women will always be nothing more than “somebody’s fantasy.” This is why a female athlete is speaking out after forfeiting her fencing match where she was paired with a trans player.

🤺🚨Historic Protest: Female Fencer Takes a Knee in Bout Against Male Opponent, Faces Immediate Disqualification

After receiving a black card for refusing to compete against a man, Redmond Sullivan's female opponent was expelled from the @USAFencing event at the Univ. of… pic.twitter.com/IloSnrb2Iu
— ICONS (@ico
title: Female fencer who wouldn't let herself get beat up by trans competitor speaks out, refuses to "go along with somebody’s fantasy”

description:
There have yet to be any reports of AOC voters vandalizing her Tesla, but it would not be surprising if those same voters vandalized a random person's vehicle solely because the left despises Musk. And while this was not always the case, as proven by the fact that AOC has a Tesla, these people always go after their own. So, even though Musk was once seen as the next Einstein among Progressives, he has officially become Hilter.

When caught off guard, AOC had nothing to say about if Democrats' rhetoric is contributing to the national Tesla attacks.

SHIFTING GEARS: @AOC hops in an elevator, dodges question from FOX News Digital about whether Democrats' rhetoric toward
title: 2028 Dem frontrunner AOC lacks courage to answer reporter when asked if her rhetoric is to blame for anti-Elon violence

description:
A woman was accused of causing thousands in damages for vandalizing a Tesla, and according to Police Chief Booker Hodges, “the suspect in this case may have been a victim.” And by that he means “in terms of the rhetoric that is being spewed out here by some of those in leadership."

The Police Chief in Bloomington, Minnesota is defending the person who vandalized a Tesla—calling them a victim. pic.twitter.com/4kxVObQUnc
— Dave Bondy (@DaveBondyTV) April 3, 2025

So, in other words, she does not like President Trump because he hurt
title: Police catch liberal woman vandalizing a Tesla, until the Police Chief claims SHE'S the real victim in all this
